knimeNode.name: Google Spreadsheet Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Write a table to a new spreadsheet's sheet in Google Sheets.

fullDescription.intro: This node writes the input data table into a new spreadsheet's sheet in Google Sheets.
fullDescription.option: The name of the spreadsheet to be created.
The name of the sheet to which the table should be written.
Whether the column names should be written in the first row.
Whether the row ids should be written in the first column.
Enter a pattern that is set for missing data values. If not specified, the corresponding cell of the sheet stays empty.
Opens the spreadsheet after it has been successfully written. The spreadsheet will be opened in the systems's default browser.
Select the columns that will be written to the sheet file. If the columns in the input table should change, they will automatically be excluded.

ports.inPort: Table to be written to a google sheet
ports.outPort: Table containing the spreadsheet name, sheet name and spreadsheet ID.
